content.text:
# 6th Golden Laurel Awards

| location      = Beverly Wilshire Hotel,Los Angeles, California
| country       = United States
| presenter     = Producers Guild of America
| award1_type   = Best Producer(s) Motion Picture:
| award1_winner = Forrest Gump – Wendy Finerman, Charles Newirth, Steve Starkey, and Steve Tisch
| previous      = 5th
| main          = PGA Awards
| next          = 7th
}}
The 6th PGA Golden Laurel Awards, honoring the best film and television producers of 1994, were held at the Regent Beverly Wilshire Hotel in Los Angeles, California on March 8, 1995. The nominees were announced on January 26, 1995.
Winners and nominees
Film
{| class="wikitable"
! colspan="2" style="background:#abcdef;" |Outstanding Producer of Theatrical Motion Pictures
|-
| colspan="2" style="vertical-align:top;"|
*'Forrest Gump – Wendy Finerman, Charles Newirth, Steve Starkey, and Steve Tisch'
**Four Weddings and a Funeral – Duncan Kenworthy
**Pulp Fiction – Lawrence Bender
**Quiz Show – Robert Redford, Michael Jacobs, Julian Krainin, and Michael Nozik
**The Shawshank Redemption – Niki Marvin
|}
Television
{| class="wikitable"
! colspan="2" style="background:#abcdef;" |Outstanding Producer of Episodic Television
|-
| colspan="2" style="vertical-align:top;"|
*'ER (NBC) – Michael Crichton and John Wells
|-
! colspan="2" style="background:#abcdef;" |Outstanding Producer of Long-Form Television
|-
| colspan="2" style="vertical-align:top;"|
*World War II: When Lions Roared – David W. Rintels, Ethel Winant, and Victoria Riskin
|}
Special
{| class="wikitable" style="width="

|-
| colspan="2" style="vertical-align:top;" |

|-

|-
| colspan="2" style="vertical-align:top;" |
* Howard W. Koch
|-
! colspan="2" style="background:#abcdef;" |Most Promising Producer in Theatrical Motion Pictures
|-
| colspan="2" style="vertical-align:top;" |
* Where the Rivers Flow North'' – Bess O'Brien and Jay Craven
|-

| colspan="2" style="vertical-align:top;" |

|-

| colspan="2" style="vertical-align:top;" |
